name: Aerodactyl
author: Shin-ichi Yoshida
flavor_text: A vicious Pokémon from the distant past, it appears to have flown by spreading its wings and gliding.

abilities.name: Prehistoric Memory
abilities.effect: Whenever an Evolved Pokémon attacks (even if it’s your opponent’s), it can use any attack from its Basic Pokémon card or any Evolution card attached to it. It still has to pay for that attack’s Energy cost. This power stops working while Aerodactyl is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fly
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent’s next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Aerodactyl. If tails, this attack does nothing (not even damage).
